patch.data: Just a small tuning patch this week. The Advisor tab was clickable last patch which was an unintended feature. We've disabled it until it is officially released.

• Collateral (Q)
    • The power ratio on this ability has been reduced to 0.4, down from 0.5.

• Branching Blade (Q)
    • The base damage of this ability has been changed to 60/95/130/165/200, from 55/95/135/175/215.

• Jagged Volley (E)
    • The cooldown of this ability has been reduced to 12/11/10/9/8, down from 14/13/12/11/10.

Destiny
  • The 370 Destiny that was allocated to new accounts will no longer be given when a new account is created. Existing Destiny awarded this way will not be affected.

Map
  • The Halloween jack-o-lanterns have been removed from the main map.

Advisor
  • The Advisor tab has been disabled - the feature will released at a future date.
